### Solution 4

```{r title="lesson-2.R"}

    size = 1:5,
    year = factor(
        c(2014, 2014, 2013, 2015, 2015),
	levels = c(2013, 2014, 2015),
	ordered = TRUE),
    prop = runif(n = 5))
```
